subject: Golf
Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: Tom Kite set a United States Senior Open record with a 28 on the front nine at Indianwood in Lake Orion, Mich., and finished at five-under-par 65 on Thursday.
snippet: Tom Kite set a United States Senior Open record with a 28 on the front nine at Indianwood in Lake Orion, Mich., and finished at five-under-par 65 on Thursday.
